title: Blackstar - Disc 1
description:
Astronaut John Blackstar\\\&#039;s shuttle passes through a black hole and crashes on the planet Sagar. He is rescued by the gentle Trobbits, who live under the tyranny of the Overlord, possessor of one half of an all-powerful sword. Armed with the other half, Blackstar aids the resistance with his dragon, Warlock; the shape-shifter Klone; and the sorceress, Mara




John Blackstar is a astronaut who finds himself marooned on the alien planet Sagar when his space-shuttle is sucked into a black hole and enters a distant universe and his space-shuttle crash landed on Sagar. Rescued by the Trobbits, peace-loving elf like people, John Blackstar decides to join the resistance who are fighting against the evil Overlord, who rules the planet with his magic sword \\\"The Power Star\\\". With the Power Star split in half, Blackstar takes the half called \\\"The Star Sword\\\", whilst the Overlord had the other half of the sword \\\"The Power Sword\\\". Blackstar and the Overlord engage in battle, as Blackstar, the resistance and Blackstar\\\&#039;s dragon Warlock set out to put a end to the Overlord\\\&#039;s tyranny on Sagar
